urls.title: Tips to complete account recovery steps - Google Account Help
urls.description: If you can't sign in, follow these steps to increase your chances of getting back into your Google Account:  Go to the Account recovery page. As you complete the steps, us

data.text: @beberrrssup_ Hi Bernardin. Just to confirm, have you already tried recovering your Google account using the steps here: https://t.co/CJQaJUwBHt? These tips may help: https://t.co/vQSZijZd6E. Let us know.
